website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Synchros S400BT is a Bluetooth headphone pair that delivers absolutely thunderous bass in a comfortable design.
pros: Powerful, distortion-free audio performance with intense bass response
Detachable cable for optional wired listening
Exceptionally comfortable, even over long listening sessions
cons: Easy to accidentally pause music or place unintentional phone calls

customer_reviews.title: JBL is great as usual
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are awesome. Base is tight and powerful, tweet is crisp and real. The sound is just off the charts. There are probably better sounding head sets out there, but they are over twice the price of these. I did experience what one reviewer's complaint about them making your ears sore after hours of wearing. However I just turned the earphones to a slight different angle and was good for hours of musical enjoyment. Additionally the microphone is good quality. I have taken phone calls with them for months, and haven't had a complaint yet. I love all my JBL products.
customer_reviews.author: larry case

customer_reviews.title: Tried a few headphones and am VERY happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few headphones and am VERY happy with these. Great sound and super comfortable. I have a big head and these fit well - many others are way too tight. Ear pads are soft and flexible. If you buy beats or bose you are overpaying. JBL is a quality brand with quality products. Encourage anyone looking for moderately priced bluetooth headphones to give these a try. Note: I have not tried the mic (not hugely important to me). I purchased the warranty with Assurian for $15.xx and have found Assurian always backs the refund with no questions asks and pays full retail that you paid (even years down the road).
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing, especially for the price they were listed at
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing, especially for the price they were listed at. I like the touch pad on the left ear cup that lets you control the music and volume. The bass is great, not over bearing. They also feel very sturdy, doesn't feel like cheap plastic like some of the other big name audio brands use.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, the price is right. Compared to beats, this set is way better, better price and better sound. Beats is only hype, JBL is a well established audio company. Just get used to the touch feature and you will be happy with them. The quality is good and the comfort is up there too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great though loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: These sound great with a lot of bass. They are also well made. My only real problem with them is that they fit/feel a little too loose on the head. Also, the cans stick out more than I prefer from the ears. Otherwise, these are really nice headphones. The charge lasts for many hours and they only take a couple hours or less to charge. The bluetooth connectivity is a great convenience, especially if you're moving around while listening preventing a cable form getting in the way.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you don't mind buying them again a year later when the hinges break.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: WARNING DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. I almost never leave a review but feel obligated to leave one on these headphones to warn others. I bought these bluetooth headphones in April 2017. They worked fine for about 4 months. Now they will not charge. Because I bought them on here instead of a regular store, I also have no warranty on this product. So now I'm stuck with $130 worth of plastic junk. Next time I will go to Best Buy where at least I'll be covered if I have an issue. Take my advice and don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorGuru

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck! Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Forget Bose or Beats. JBL came thru for middle America on these. They should be $200+ headphones bc they play and wear just like those in that price range. Ive been a JBL car speaker buyer since the late 80s and if you know their speakers then these wont disappoint. Go gettem!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 pairs of these. They both broke in the same place. The hinges are made of plastic and very weak. Even being very careful with them after breaking the first pair, the second pair still broke. I would not recommend these for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find a better item.. if you can. Trust me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend's graduation present but I'm left so disappointed to learn that in just a month or so the bluetooth stopped working and the headphone would not even charge. When plugged in, the led turns red. Thats it. JBL support team though was fantastic at helping and offering a replacement in face of JBL Everest 300. Not sure if that is a sweet deal or worse but this was something that we have experienced and I guess I'm going for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Raaj Jadaun

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Sound quality is great! Battery lasts sooo long. Foldable and compact. I like the touch and the light. I'm happy I got them! Also durable, 4.5 months snd still look new. I use them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Nonpareil6

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Headphones for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: for the money and the price these headphones can't be beat. bass, treble, and overall sound quality is extremely balanced. the option for wired or Bluetooth connections is great. battery lasts for quite a long time. carrying case is a great accessory. couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the fit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fit, style, sound, and functionality of these headphones. However, the bluetooth performance was terrible. It constantly cut out, even while I had my phone or watch on me. Hopefully it was just the set that I received and others are not experiencing this, because these headphones otherwise would have been great and exactly what I was looking for. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: tspoon22

customer_reviews.title: it works and sound great. At the max volume the audio can be ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of the product had cosmetic wear; it was not sealed and seemed pre-opened. Other than that, it works and sound great. At the max volume the audio can be heard from the outside. It is not to tight on the head so there is not too much pressure from the headphones. With that being said, if you are looking to use it at the gym (athletic activities) I would just be careful. Overall, I got what I paid for and it works.
customer_reviews.author: M_C

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, my only complaint is that the touch ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, my only complaint is that the touch controls are a bit finnicky. They sometimes register a touch when I don't intend one, and sometimes fail to register a touch when I do intend to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Butters

customer_reviews.title: So very disappointed in these headphones
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed in these headphones. I can't be more than a foot away for them to stay paired to anything. They keep cutting in and out. Customer service was a joke, I had to explain to them what I found on the internet and the sheet that came with the headphone to try to reset the Bluetooth connection and now I am stuck with a damn paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Welcoming Tiger living in kindness

customer_reviews.title: Sound great and work great
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and work great, but the hinge on the ear piece broke quickly and now they won't stay tight on my head. I guess that's why this design was discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Smaller ear cups, Superior sound quality, design and build quality- have fun enjoying sound how it should be!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound quality and great bass I will choose these over beats any day
customer_reviews.author: Allen Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: My sound in the left ear stopped working and JBL said because it's 1 year and 4th since purchase they couldn't replace. Now I have $160 pair of headphones I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Woodfill

customer_reviews.title: Jbl did great job, love this headphone...
customer_reviews.text: Best ever headphone in my headphone collection, I gave 5 out of 5, this headphone even better then Sony extra bass which price all most double.... Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: and are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: There are some little cords hidden in the packaging. Make sure you get them out. These are very high quality headphones, and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several different pairs of both wired and Bluetooth over ear head phones. These are by far the best I have ever had. Great battery life, fit and feel are amazing and the have that classic JBL sound. So well balanced I can listen to anything from Jazz to Hip Hop and not feel like anything is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she simply loves it. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: brigante

customer_reviews.title: For me these headphones were just a bit too big ...
customer_reviews.text: For me these headphones were just a bit too big. I returned them but it in no way was the fault of The seller.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Darlow

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they sound and blocks out background noise
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they sound and blocks out background noise .But when am doing chest work all day, slip off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect listening.
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I have ever had and purchased for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The order was delivered ahead of time. The product was upto expectations. The packing was excellent and ensured that the product arrived in mint condition. Super happy! These head phones are awesome as I love the heavy base. If you want base then this is the headphones I recommend you should buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these headphones. As long as you maintain them, they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have been great. If you can't figure out the touch feature
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for a year. They have been great. If you can't figure out the touch feature, I am sorry. It is relatively easy to figure out and not hard to remember not to touch when adjusting the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Spoonts

customer_reviews.title: Be a leader and not a follower.  These JBL's performance and looks outdoes any other bluetooth stereo headset, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones will blow you away. Extra deep powerful bass that rumbles your head combined with piercingly clear highs that could very well shatter glass. Comfortable real leather ear cushions and inner headband cushion, easy to learn controls, durable construction, and killer looks. EVERYONE WILL ASK WHERE YOU GOT THEM AND HOW MUCH THEY COST!! That is worth the price alone. The huge bonus is hearing your music better than ever before and better than other people are hearing theirs on their headphones. It's a great feeling knowing that and puts a big smile on your face every time you wear them! Get a pair and get a pair!
customer_reviews.author: bclayman

customer_reviews.title: In love with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with everything about these headphones. The sound is incredible---highs, lows, and everything in between. They are super comfortable, both lightweight but snug and secure. The bluetooth has great range and I like that you also have the option to have them wired. And it's a great bonus that they fold and come with a case (which also has a pocket for the cords); a big plus for people like me who uses these when I travel. I wear them even when I don't really need to because I just love being so immersed in the awesome sound that these deliver. JBL quality continues to excel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy to own one..Excellent on Audio and Build quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect to devices (tried with iPhone and Dell laptops etc)..takes 5 seconds. Looks sturdy but feels heavy on the head. The audio quality is very good and meets my expectations of listening to talk shows and rock music.
customer_reviews.author: Shivaraja

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Don't hesitate. Happier with these than my beats. Comfy clear crisp sounds with bass.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter, and she loves them. Sound quality is good, and they are easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are soo good!! nice bass, long battery life. And overall great build quality

customer_reviews.title: excellent headphones, love the touch controls
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! excellent headphones, love the touch controls! Too bad I can't them. My son took them and refuses to return them!

customer_reviews.title: sounds great! very loud but the bluetooth range isnt that ...
customer_reviews.text: sounds great ! very loud but the bluetooth range isnt that great.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headset
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headset. Somtime i messes up when I am taking the train but its still pretty good. I had it for a month.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High performance bluetooth headphones at an affordable price, do not regret this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great wireless and even better wired
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great wireless and even better wired!!! Very versatile headphone with lots of full and rich bass.... and they are loud with no distortion!!!! Synchros S700 are next!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable.... all i can say. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable....all i can say. Impossible to beat for the money. Simply amazing

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, especially in middle range.

customer_reviews.text: I was curious when I ordered jbl ...headphone.. It's my first time I am goin to use it..it's match what features I want in it..thanks jbl..sound quality wooowww...

customer_reviews.title: Right cup No sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my JBL S400BT in June of 2014. I have absolutely loved these headphones! Operation is easy. I travel a ton and often fall asleep with these on my head. They are soft. I get no ear fatigue. Bass is good, sound is good. I have never dropped, abused or got the headphones wet. They are kept in a shock free, moisture free environment. WHY THE ONE STAR? This week the right cup stopped producing sound. A very nice quality brand $200 device that stops working after 2.5 years is unacceptable! I have electronics from the 80's that still work!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great productos, great sound. Battery lasts around 15 hours. Integrated mic works great. Touch control system is really practique
customer_reviews.author: calule

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, good sound and quality, nice price and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Arm broke after only 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I had these headphones for 3 months, they worked mostly good, there was an odd audio pop in the headphones that occurred a few times while using them. After 3 months of normal use the arm has broken and the headphones are completely unusable. While normally extending the arms to remove the headphones from around my neck, the arm broke out of the plastic frame. There's no way to save it, for headphones this expensive, to only last 3 months with standard use is just shameful.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Barron

customer_reviews.title: It was a very good investment. He wanted them for his birthday
customer_reviews.text: My fiance LOVES his JBL wireless headphones. It was a very good investment. He wanted them for his birthday, so I ordered online. Again, it was a VERY good investment.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, incredible sound from JBL they didnt disappoint its
customer_reviews.text: Very good,incredible sound from JBL they didnt disappoint its brand

customer_reviews.title: JBL Synchros
customer_reviews.text: I love JBL products and have a home recording studio with multiple JBL products. This is a good company that stands behind their products. The sound is very good.. They are easy to charge. The charge lasts for hours. The controls are interesting and require some practice to balance, but once they are burned in, they are as good as it gets for bluetooth.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product Nicky brand never hear music like this

customer_reviews.title: and the touch sensor is perfect he has no complaints about it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my teenage son, he had taken several months to review the kind he wanted. He was very excited to get them. They arrived several days early. He loves them. He does say they fit his head a bit loosely however they far surpass his expectations as far as sound and quality, and the touch sensor is perfect he has no complaints about it. Great product, great service, great price!

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with JBL
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones. JBL never fail to amaze me in terms of quality and performance. Yes there are a few minor flaws that come along with the product. 1. Initially, the headphones are a bit complicated to use and take some time getting use to. 2. The control panels are touch activated which some would find an inconvenience where in reality takes a simple fix: don't touch the sensors. Other than that, the headphones are very stylish, loud, clear/smooth and hightech.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great bass.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable wearing, not pressing on ears at all. Good quality of heigh and low frequencies. Good quality with bluetooth connection.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones I would definitely recommend awesome they have a ...

customer_reviews.title: Take note
customer_reviews.text: Headphone arrived with no damage , work fine and is new as well . However , i am returning the product due to following reasons 1. It is a tight fit and squeezes head . 2. Ears get warm very soon on wearing 3. Headphone turns out to be a bit heavy and I am uncomfortable to Wear it along with specs as it is causing alignment problem .I have cylinder eye sight issues . I have a medium to big sized head .

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth head phones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones for the money! Bought them for under $80 with great highs, mid and lows. I listen to every type of music, from Frank Sinatra, to AC/DC, to Snoop Dog. The charge on the head phones impressed me too... 14 hours before I had to switch to the plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the Beats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wanting an over the ear headset because I feel they can produce better sound but now I find that I don't use them at all. They are not at all comfortable as they are too tight on my head and I am now back to using ear buds. I would just buy the Beats headphones and stop wasting time and money on anything different. The JBL sound is good but the tight headband outweighs the advantages.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Trautweiler

customer_reviews.title: If only the headband do not slip! These are ...

customer_reviews.title: Spotty Bluetooth range
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones. Bluetooth range is very very spotty and doesn't work even in 1 meter radius even though specified range is 10 meters. Had to return. Bad experience with JBL.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Anniversary Present
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new headphones. JBL is the best for sound quality and they prove it with these wireless headphones. He has gotten use to using the functions on the left ear set to control his music and movies. Wonderful product. All the specs listed on the product was true and went above my standards.

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with the subpar quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke down after a few months use. Frankly, I am disappointed with the subpar quality of this product.​

I being wearing this baby's for a week at the gym and they being turning heads some of my friends ordered some like mine already because this headphones are better than beats by far!!!

product_meta.title: JBL Synchros 400BT Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Stereo Headphones, Black
product_meta.description: The S400BT Black: superb JBL sound & inspiring displayListen to the JBL S400BT via Bluetooth or connected with the included audio cable and you will experience breath–taking possible audio experience. Joining the family of Synchros headphones, is the latest to be inspired by premium JBL nightclub sound systems found the world over. Comfortable, pillow–soft ear cups fold from their collapsible steel headband and embrace the accuracy and warmth of JBL PureBass performance. JBL refuses to compromise on engineering headphones that produce high quality audio blended seamlessy with ease of use. That's why the S400BT headphones use Bluetooth 3.0 with advanced aptX digital encoding technology to stream the richest wireless audio experience available. An intuitive touch–sensor interface on the left earcup lets you customize music volume, navigate tracks, or receive calls with little as a swipe of the finger. No need to memorize where every little button on the headphones, when the entire earcup face is touch sensitive. Meanwhile, an LED light trail tracks the movement of your fingers across the touch sensor – spotlighting your audio experience for all eyes to see. No wonder your head feels a little like it's basking in victory from ear–to–ear.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth 3.0 technology for a wireless listening experience
JBL Professional Audio sound with Pure Bass performance and advanced aptX encoding allows for best possible wireless audio experience
Touch sensor controls intuitively manage music and calls
USB recharge battery lasts up to 15 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
